name: Apple Tree
desc:
A fruit tree in a middle of the village.
Who would have thought.

name: Startled Crow
desc:
The crow appears to be going for the eyes.
Quickly cover before the impact.

Perfect fishing bait.

desc:

Perhaps grab some.

name: Stack Overflow
desc: This game exists thanks to the internet.
